metadata.title: CVE-2018-18249 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Icinga Web 2 before 2.6.2 allows injection of PHP ini-file directives viavectors involving environment variables as the channel to send informationto the attacker, such as aname=${PATH}_${APACHE_RUN_DIR}_${APACHE_RUN_USER} parameter to/icingaweb2/navigation/add or /icingaweb2/dashboard/new-dashlet.

criterions.comment: icingaweb2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
